content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) connected to a Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5) storing coal
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=42.5, y=-80.5), and (x=43.5, y=-80.5) waiting for source items

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5) storing iron ore and iron plates
- Stone Furnaces at positions (x=-13.0, y=-48.0), (x=-11.0, y=-48.0), and (x=-9.0, y=-48.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=-15.5, y=-48.5), (x=-14.5, y=-46.5), and (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) waiting for source items
- Iron Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-47.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Items
- Ensure the target entity has the items available for extraction before attempting to extract.

### Errors when Transferring Iron Ore to Furnaces
- Verify that the source contains iron ore before attempting to transfer it to the furnace.

### Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Check that the source entities connected to the inserters have the necessary items to be transferred.

### Chest Full Warnings
- Regularly check and empty chests at drop positions to prevent mining drills from halting operations due to full storage.
